TopicTitle: Remember HomeWorld 2? Its getting a hd remake soon!

Articles.Content:
Just want to share the articles i found about that. Personally, i LOVE that game, even if its 10 years old! Very easy to control, yet very challenging.

http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2014-03-06-gearboxs-homeworld-hd-is-now-homeworld-remastered

http://www.homeworldremastered.com/
The collectors Edition is currently only avaiable on Amazon.com and not in other countries, that sucks.
Its still in pre-order! I guess it will be available on steam store when its released.

Its still in pre-order! I guess it will be available on steam store when its released.

I dont want it from steam, I want the freaking big Hiigara Mothership model!

Deciding whether or not to pre-order....thought the model is nice, I don't know if I have the room for it on my desk.

Still, I'm also waiting for this: http://blackbirdinteractive.com/ ; new game based on the Homeworld series. Was originally going to be a totally independent project, but this provided a rich storyline for a prequel.
